creditline: Gift of Mrs. F. Peavey Heffelfinger, Mrs. James O. Moore, Jr., and Mrs. Walter P. Bradley
description: from a set of 12 cups and saucers in silver lustre on white, in grape design; teapot H.5-1/2 x L.8-1/2 in. creamer J.6 x L.5 in., sugar 5-1/2 x L.4 in., covered bowl (chipped) H.4 x L.3 in.
object_name: Cup and saucer from a tea service
title: Cup and saucer from a tea service
